title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Advanced Physics Simulation Experiment Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of college-level general physics and basic experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify key variables in physical phenomena and apply them to simulation models.
Learners can analyze and interpret experimental data using simulation tools such as PhET or Tracker.
Learners can suggest variable control strategies required for designing actual physics experiments based on simulation results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
